TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HorizontalAlign extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the horizontal alignment of items within a container.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The HorizontalAlign enumeration represents the horizontal alignment options for items within a container, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>.
## Examples The following example shows how setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control changes the horizontal alignment for the text of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
[!code-cs[System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_397_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_397_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign Center = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The contents of a container are centered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign Justify = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The contents of a container are uniformly spread out and aligned with both the left and right margins.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign Left = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The contents of a container are left justified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign NotSet = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The horizontal alignment is not set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign Right = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The contents of a container are right justified.
